refsect1.title: Installation requirements on other platforms
refsect1.para: PHP >= 5.2.1 and ImageMagick >= 6.2.4 is required. The amount of formats supported is by Imagick is entirely dependent upon the amount of formats supported by your ImageMagick installation. For example, Imagemagick requires ghostscript to conduct PDF operations.

refsect1.title: Installation requirements on Windows
refsect1.para: Version information does not differ from that above. There are binaries available from &url.imagemagick; so that you can load this extension on Windows without need for a compiler.
